member.name: T:ActiveXScriptLib.Extensions.ActiveScriptEngineExtensions
member.summary: Provides useful extension methods when using the ActiveScriptEngine.

member.name: M:ActiveXScriptLib.Extensions.ActiveScriptEngineExtensions.NewInstanceOf(ActiveXScriptLib.ActiveScriptEngine,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the specified class from within the script engine and returns it.
member.param: The ActiveScriptEngine to create the instance from.
The name of the class to create an instance of.

member.name: M:ActiveXScriptLib.Extensions.ActiveScriptEngineExtensions.Evaluate``1(ActiveXScriptLib.ActiveScriptEngine,System.String)
member.summary: Provides a generic overload for engine.Evaluate. This method will invoke Convert.ChangeType on the returned value to try convert it to type T. This provides a more easier way to get the value of a type you want.
member.typeparam: The Type to convert the returned value of Evaluate to.
member.param: The ActiveScriptEngine to invoke Evaluate on.
The code to evaluate inside engine.
member.returns: The value returned after the evaluation as type T.
